sentence.Network_en: Allow an extra 10-15 min if you prefer lamb well done.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果想让羊羔肉完全熟透还需要再煮10到15分钟。

sentence.Network_en: I braised some beans to accompany a shoulder of lamb.
sentence.Network_cn: 我炖了些豆子，和羊肘子一块吃。

sentence.Network_en: You should have prepared something other than lamb and ratatouille.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了羊肉和蔬菜杂烩之外，你本应再准备点儿别的。
